text.paragraph: Patient given chemotherapy. Was also evaluated for back pain. Patient may have metastasis; also may have depression. Referred to psychiatry, scheduled a bone scan and prescribed medication for sleeping.

value.displayName: Malignant neoplasm of female breast

tr.td: Patient was previously administered two cycles of Gemcitabine 2,225 mg (1,250 mg/m2), and Cisplatin 133.5 mg (75mg/m2). BSA=1.78 based on duBois formula. The intent is to administer one more cycle of Gemcitabine 2,225 mg (1,250 mg/m2), and Cisplatin 133.5 mg (75mg/m2) as part of a four-cycle chemotherapeutic treatment.

section.title: TREATMENT PLAN
section.text: Scheduled MRI of thoracic spine. Patient was referred to Dr. Mentalis for assessment of possible depression. Prescribed Ramelteon 8 mg oral table to aid in sleeping.

code.displayName: MRI SPINAL CANAL THORACIC W/O CONTRAST MATRL

section.title: PROBLEMS
section.text: Patient has breast cancer and diabetes

value.displayName: Type 2 diabetes mellitus without complications
Malignant neoplasm of upper-outer quadrant of right female breast

section.title: Procedures
section.text: Patient has undergone Ultrasound guided percutaneous needle biopsy of the right breast and a radical mastectomy and axillary node dissection of the right breast.

code.displayName: Biopsy, breast, with placement of breast localization device(s) (eg, clip, metallic pellet), when performed, and imaging of the biopsy specimen, when performed, percutaneous; first lesion, including ultrasound guidance

code.displayName: Mastectomy, modified radical, including axillary lymph nodes, with or without pectoralis minor muscle, but excluding pectoralis major muscle
